info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 21 at 3:09AM MDT until July 21 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Temperatures up to 100 expected. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau, including Farmington, Aztec and Bloomfield. * WHEN...From Noon today to 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses such as heat exhaustion and heat stroke.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
